portfolio.title: Community Pursuit
portfolio.mission: To contribute technical and organizational services to projects, organizations, and initiatives that contribute to the well-being of a community.
portfolio.description: I started Community Pursuit to practice my technical skills and apply them to community-centric projects.

portfolio.title: KauaiForward
portfolio.mission: To connect local orgs with grant opportunities and information about the community.
portfolio.description: KauaiForward displays the grant opportunities offered by the County of Kauai's Office of Economic Development. It also informs the public of OED's ongoing programs, resources put together for different audiences, and updates from partner organizations.

portfolio.title: Economic Dashboard
portfolio.mission: To track the economic conditions of Kauai using state publicized data.
portfolio.description: Using Census data, information released from the Department of Business, Economic Development, and Tourism (DBEDT)'s data warehouses, and other data sets, I created data flows and procedures to update the dashboard and watch Kauai-specific indicators. The visuals in this dashboard can be altered and analyzed in other cases as well.

portfolio.title: I Am Weekend
portfolio.mission: To bring together teens and young adults to encourage creative entrepreneural solutions to real-life problems.
portfolio.description: I Am Weekend was a workshop spearheaded by Kauai Planning and Action Alliance that partnered with the Small Business Development Center and local entrepreneurs. The workshop brought people of all ages together to create entrepreneurial solutions to local issues. The participants practiced teamwork, prototyping, and presenting.
